meanings.definition: A port city in southern France.
meanings.sent1: Marseille is a beautiful city by the sea.
meanings.sent2: Ships from around the world dock at Marseille's port.
meanings.sent3: The pirates decided to retire in Marseille and open a seafood restaurant.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was a bustling Marseille, full of stories and adventures.
meanings.sent5: The sunsets in Marseille paint the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: A type of fabric with a raised pattern.
meanings.sent1: She wore a lovely dress made of Marseille.
meanings.sent2: The couch was covered in soft Marseille fabric.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the Marseille fabric was a perfect scratching post.
meanings.sent4: The Marseille design on the curtains added elegance to the room.
meanings.sent5: The Marseille texture felt luxurious against her skin.

meanings.definition: A type of soap made in Marseille, France.
meanings.sent1: She washed her hands with Marseille soap.
meanings.sent2: The scent of Marseille filled the bathroom.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dog ran away with the Marseille soap bar.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed in the bathroom, scented with Marseille.
meanings.sent5: The Marseille soap left her skin feeling soft and clean.
